thread.title: Coach's eye

author: Whiteley, R.
title: Coach's eye
text: €4.45 and $4.99 base, additional $19.99 for “Everything Pack” (reviewed). About the app Coach's Eye can be considered simply as an advanced camera recording and playback app with the ability to mark up the videos (add overlaid lines, text, highlights, etc), but for the sports medicine physiotherapist, doctor, biomechanist or any clinician who needs to view athlete/patient movement, and analyse and give feedback, it is much more. Use in clinical practice Camera apps rarely allow you to easily ‘scrub’ the video forward and backward at different speeds, or easily provide slow motion and frame-by-frame playback. Coach's Eye has an intuitive flywheel video scrubber interface that gives you this power. For many, this functionality, available in the least expensive base pack, will be enough for most needs. Additionally, the app offers the ability to compare two videos side by side (eg, before/after, novice/expert, injured/uninjured, left/right) …
